title: #446 Swipe Right If You're Horny with Jared Freid
itunes:title: Swipe Right If You're Horny with Jared Freid
description:
Modern love guru Jared Freid talks to me, a renowned late pull outer, about the dating scene, what can be improved on the apps, his successes, and failures with romance, and his hatred of charcuterie boards.

I go off during the intro about my own sexual mishaps with Tinder and why these dating apps are worse for society than a billion nose jobs. 

Second show added in Salt Lake City. The first one sold out in 3 days. So if you wanted to go, you better get tickets now.

Boston at the Wilbur Theater on December 9. 

Tampa and Orlando in November

OKC, Boston, and San Antonio in December

Cleveland and Phoenix in January

Denver in February

Get tickets at AriShaffir.com

Follow Jared:

Instagram

Twitter

TikTok

Listen to his podcasts, U Up? and J Train Podcast, and more!

The Music:

The Ronettes - Be My Baby

HIPPO - Swipe

Daft Punk - Get Lucky

The Raveonettes - That Great Love Sound

Charlie Robison - My Hometown

Thank you to our sponsors! Go to LiquidIV.com for 25% off your order using code "Skeptic"

Go to 3chi.com and use code "Skeptic" and you'll get 5% off Delta 8 products! 

And head to YoKratom.com home of the $60 Kilo!

Thanks for sponsoring this episode and making me put out content each week.
